framework.objects

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.core.UpdateObject
      • framework.objects.CanvasObject
        • framework.objects.Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Collisionable, Updateable

    public class Line
extends CanvasObject
    The Class Line defines simple lines from a staring point to an end point.

    You cannot make lines thicker or thinner!

    Author:
    Hans Ferchland

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Line()
      Instantiates a new line with default parameter.
      Line(Point start, Point end, Color color)
      Instantiates a new line with a given start- and end-point and color.

        Parameters:

        end - the initial end position of the line
        color - the color of the line
